summary: A documentary about the design of cities, which looks at the issues and strategies behind urban design and features some of the world's foremost architects, planners, policymakers, builders, and thinkers.
cast: Rem Koolhaas|Norman Foster|Jan Gehl|Oscar Niemeyer|Amanda M. Burden|Rahul Mehrotra|Robert Hammond|Jon Bird|Grady Gammage Jr.|Alejandro Aravena|Joshua David|Edgar Pieterse|Udo Andriof|Sheela Patel|Candy Chang|Enrique Penalosa|Noah Chasin|Fritz Mielert|Kathryn Ewing|Bruce Katz|Ricardo Scofidio|Sicelo Nkohla|Alastair Graham|Eduardo Paes|James Corner|Mark Covington|Yung Ho Chang|Jacqueline James|Grover Moulton|Michael Sorkin|Tarna Klitzner|Gangolf Stocker|Ricky Burdett|Stefan Mappus|Ellen Dunham-Jones
keywords: new york city new york|design|city|urban design|architect
title: Urbanized
